title: Please help... I cant remember the name of that font
content:
Here is a quick illustration of a ''N'' that  
I remember working with that font  
years ago.

but I cant remember the name.

anybody have any ideas?

author: ericquenneville

comments.content: looks backwards. are you sure thick line is in the right place?
That's one neat-looking alphabet (I mean the mixture of line weights within one single letter).
